mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ , BOARD_RE_REF , BOARD_RE_LEV , BOARD_RE_SEQ , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SUBJECT , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_HITS , DEL_YN , INS_USER_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS INS_DATE , UPD_USER_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS UPD_DATE FROM board.MyBOARD ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT BOARD_SEQ , BOARD_RE_REF , BOARD_RE_LEV , BOARD_RE_SEQ , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SUBJECT , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_HITS , DEL_YN , INS_USER_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS INS_DATE , UPD_USER_ID , CAST( DATE_FORMAT( UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS CHAR(19) ) AS UPD_DATE FROM board.MyBOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE board.MyBOARD SET BOARD_HITS = BOARD_HITS + 1 , UPD_USER_ID = 'NONMEMBER' , UPD_DATE = NOW() WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board.MyBOARD ( BOARD_RE_REF , BOARD_RE_LEV , BOARD_RE_SEQ , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_SUBJECT , BOARD_CONTENT , INS_USER_ID , INS_DATE , UPD_USER_ID , UPD_DATE ) VALUES ( 0 , 0 , 0 , #{board_writer} , #{board_subject} , #{board_content} , 'NONMEMBER' , NOW() , 'NONMEMBER' , NOW() )
